data.actual_result: The call returns to Connecting state and then reconnects
data.expected_result: The call should continue without interrupting
data.short_description: While you are in a Group DM voice call, if someone changes the name or the icon of the group, the call will disconnect and reconnect on its own
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a Group DM - Start a call - Have someone in the group change the name or the icon of the group
